attributes.action: Allow a no confidence vote in Boris Johnson.
attributes.additional_details: Blocking a vote of no confidence is unprecedented in British political history. It is undemocratic, as it denies the British people a chance to decide who they want to represent and govern them.
attributes.background: The government has not allowed time for a debate on a vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson. It is clear that the people want him removed from office asap. The government should allow a vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson. It is the right thing to do. The voice of the people must be heard.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence, either in the Government or Prime Minister.
